name: Project Zero
description:
Project Zero is a very short 3D SHMUP prototype made as a part of a programming course. The game currently features 1 level with 2 powerups, 2 weapons, enemies and obstacles. The windows version additionally offers full controller support (bumpers don't work on the HTML5 version for some reason). 

Controls:

Keyboard Controls12Move WASD Arrow keys Shoot plasmaSpacebarShoot rocketsLeftShift
Gamepad Controls12MoveD-PadLeft-StickShoot plasmaLeft TriggerRight TriggerShoot rocketsLeft/Right BumperB-button

Music Credits:

Industrial Cinematic by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3909-industrial-cinematic

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
